code: import React,{Component}from'react';import CourseType from'../courseList/CourseType';import CourseData from'../../../data/course/CourseData.json';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";class CourseGrid extends Component{render(){const CourseItems=CourseData.slice(0,6);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"section-padding page",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"course-top-wrap",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"row align-items-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-lg-8",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Showing 1-6 of 8 results"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-lg-4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"topbar-search",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{method:"get",action:"#",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Search our courses",className:"form-control"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fa fa-search"})})]})})})]})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"row ",children:CourseItems.map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"course-item col-lg-6 col-md-6",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CourseType,{data:item})},item.id))})})]});}}export default CourseGrid;
